title: Fantasy RPG Weapons Icons - 170 Transparent Background 2D Art Pack
description: The comprehensive collection designed to bring your game to life with a diverse range of fantasy RPG weapon icons.
longDescription:
Introducing the "Fantasy RPG Weapons Icons - 170 Transparent Background 2D Art Pack," a comprehensive collection designed to bring your game to life with a diverse range of fantasy RPG weapon icons. Perfect for developers creating fantasy-themed games, this art pack features 170 meticulously crafted icons, all set against transparent backgrounds for seamless integration into your projects.

Key Features:

  • High-Quality Icons: Each icon is delivered in a 1024x1024 pixel resolution, ensuring that your game displays crisp, clear weapon art across all devices.
  • Wide Variety: With 170 unique weapon designs, including swords, axes, hammers and shields, you're sure to find the perfect weapon for every character or scenario.
  • Ready to Use: Every icon comes in PNG format with a transparent background, making it easy to incorporate them directly into your game without the need for additional editing.
  • Universal Compatibility: Whether you're working on a desktop or mobile game, these icons are designed to fit seamlessly into any platform, enhancing the visual appeal of your RPG.

Versatility of Use:

These icons are not just limited to RPGs; they can be used in a variety of game genres, including strategy games, card games, or any project that could benefit from high-quality fantasy weapon imagery. The diversity in weapon types allows for creative storytelling and character development, enriching the gaming experience.

Ease of Integration:

Designed with developers in mind, this art pack allows for easy drag-and-drop integration into your game project. The transparent backgrounds and uniform resolution across all icons mean you can start populating your game world with beautiful weapon icons right away, with minimal fuss.

Support and Updates:

As this is the first version of the Fantasy RPG Weapons Icons pack, we are committed to providing updates and support based on user feedback. We encourage you to share your experiences, suggestions, or any issues you encounter, as we aim to continually improve our products to meet your needs.

We Want to Hear from You!

Your feedback is invaluable to us. Please leave your ratings and reviews to help us improve and to assist other developers in finding high-quality assets for their games. Should you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out at [annaemily2110@gmail.com].

Dive into a world of fantasy with the "Fantasy RPG Weapons Icons - 170 Transparent Background 2D Art Pack" and bring an extra layer of depth and detail to your game today!
technicalDetails:
• Asset Title: Fantasy RPG Weapons Icons - 170 Transparent Background 2D Art Pack
  • Resolution: Each icon is rendered at a high resolution of 1024x1024 pixels, ensuring clarity and detail in every weapon design.
  • Format: PNG format for wide compatibility and ease of use. Each icon features a transparent background for flexible integration into various game environments and interfaces.
  • Number of Icons: The pack includes 170 unique weapon icons, offering a wide range of fantasy-themed weapons such as swords, axes, hammers and shields.
  • Version: This is the first version of the asset pack, designed with quality and developer convenience in mind.
  • Compatibility: The icons are compatible with all major game development engines and software, ensuring ease of integration regardless of the platform you are working on.
